storyInfo: An unexpected guest arrives at Robin's cell, claiming to be an assassin, and offering her a deal.

attributes.content: What am I even meant to do...?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Ahem.
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: Is something the matter, sir?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Ah, Miss Robin, I've been wanting to meet you.
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: I presume right now you're waverin' over whether to continue your own hit, or if you help Anthony jump ship?
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: Who're you?!
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: My name is Jesselton, Miss Robin.
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: Don't you worry, I'm just like you. I'm one of the hitmen sent in here to take out Anthony.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: An' I so happened to hear Mr. Anthony inviting you to break out...
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Mr. Anthony, Captain Barton was wondering if you are doing okay. Are you hurt?
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: Nothing serious; just a few scrapes. Let him know to wait a little longer. I'll be finished here soon.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Right, not a problem. Take your time.
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: You were the jailer back there?!
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Ah, looks like you remember me. Wonderful. I like to imagine I'm pretty memorable.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: If you'd gone and forgotten me, why, I'd feel sad as a burdenbeast.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Y—you were listening there the whole time?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Hah hah. I was the one who brought your prison pals over while they were out stone cold.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Anthony mighta kept his voice down in that 'safe room' of his, but, see, I'm the kinda person who notices things. Wasn't difficult at all to listen in.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: What are you trying to do?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I'm here to give you a deal, Miss Robin.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: A deal?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: A deal.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Of course, we can't forget to praise Mr. Anthony for his moves.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: What he did was offer you the olive branch, but truth is whether you accepted or not, it wouldn't do him no harm.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Marvelous move. I gotta say, even I can't help but give it a gold star.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: It's a crying shame that he don't understand who you are.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Otherwise, I fear he'da given it a second thought.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Who I am?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Yup. You see, you, Miss Robin, have not yet sensed the factual relationship that exists between you and Mr. Anthony.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Can you get to the point?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Miss Robin, do you still recall the name of that place your pop worked, back in his lively days?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: BlackCloud.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Right on. BlackCloud Trade Corporation.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Your pop was the general manager there. But right when his business reached the shining peak, BlackCloud Trade suddenly went under.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: After that, no matter how he tried, business never picked up again. Ever since, he kept tumbling. Started drinking. These days, he lies on a hospital bed waiting for his medical fees so he can get operated.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: So, you know who bankrupted BlackCloud Trade?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: You don't mean...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Correct. Simon Co. themselves. The family name Mr. Anthony's so proud of? Simon one and the same.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Of course, I gotta prove I'm being genuine. So let me give you the whole picture.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: The short story is, six years ago, the Simons and HydeBro fought over something.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Both sides wanted the other's half of the pie. Both sides were pretty even weights. Their tussling and bustling grew and grew, until the day someone drew blood.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: In the end, it was HydeBro one step ahead, and the Simons were dust in the wind.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: During the calamity, Smith Simon at the head of the family decided his only son, Anthony Simon, oughta be sent to to another city.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: And then, once he escaped to Ironforge City, poor little Anthony got captured.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Lucky thing is, in Ironforge City's state law, all criminals are tried in the state itself.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: In other words, he was not sent back to Bunkerhill City for trial. Then, after that, state law said he'd be locked in their own Mansfield State Prison.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Now, I gotta say, I think Ol' Smith planned this well in advance, sending his son to Ironforge to be captured.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: When all's said and done, Anthony's safe precisely because he's not in Bunkerhill City, where HydeBro rule the land.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Does this have anything to do with my pop?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Course it does.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I just told you Simon were competitors of a kind with HydeBro. Even if they were a move behind, they'd still get a last word in while death was a-comin'.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: And there among the gang they spat that last word at, why, that was your ol' man's company—BlackCloud Trade.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: We can also assume, if the Simons were one step ahead of HydeBro instead, then Smith Simon would've had the marbles to far outstrip the Brothers all those years.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: But just like the Simons went poof overnight, BlackCloud Trade took the Simons' death struggles square, and when the sun came up, they'd vanished.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Your pop, of course, wanted to make a comeback. But would his rivals give him the chance?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Not in a million years.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: So Columbian business goes. Times it stinks more of blood than the battlefield.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: And because of that, your pop's never been up on his feet since.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Now, so, I've gotta admit, it makes total sense why Mr. Anthony wants to get outta here and give HydeBro hell twice over.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: But you, Miss Robin?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: We can both assume for sure, if HydeBro never wiped out the Simons, then the Simons would've never taken down your pop's BlackCloud Trade with 'em.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: We can also assume, if the Simons were one step ahead of HydeBro instead, then Smith Simon would've had ambitions to far outstrip the Brothers all those years.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: He might've even been more peaceful in dealing with HydeBro's various underling firms.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: But 'if' don't live anywhere.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Present reality is—the Simons have caused your ol' man's collapse.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: And the guy you're killing, Anthony Simon, is that family's last man standing. Their sole survivor.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I don't think it adds up like that.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Sure! Of course, I'm not gonna tell you this is righteous, Miss Robin, this ain't no justice at all.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: If tragedies can be weighed, then I must say, the debt HydeBro owes Mr. Anthony is far heavier than what Mr. Anthony owes you.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: But does that mean your revenge has to wait its sweet turn until his is done?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Is your pain worth less than his?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: That ain't right.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Pain's an equal mistress.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Think about all those miserable years your ol' man's gone through. You've got enough reason to put the big guy to death, don't you?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: And we must consider something else too, Miss Robin.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Something even more practical.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: The Simons are already ruined. Even if Mr. Anthony can break his way out, even if he promises to sweeten your pop, even if at the very end he succeeds—
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: What the hell is he able to give you?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Can he pay all those urgent medical fees for you?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Can he get your pop to the most cutting-edge hospital out there for treatment?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Maybe ol' Smith passed his business brain down to his son, but in the short-term, he can't do squat.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: But me, I can give you these things.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: You can think it over, Miss Robin.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: You're...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: You can think it over, Miss Robin.
You're... the one hiring me?!
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I am. Here in the flesh.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I sympathize with your experiences, but I have figured out how you tick. I know you aren't willing to take charity, and I don't like giving others charity either.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: So I've prepared for you a deal.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Why would you tell me all that?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Of course, I was not planning to reach out to you at first. Only, this move Mr. Anthony made has forced me out.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Forgive my sorrows once more, but after living in here, even I was one step away from Mr. Anthony's boldness winning me over.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: And if I hadn't told you any of this, you would've let that cheap sympathy go to your head, and you would've chosen to help him.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: And if I were running some basic con on you today—say, Mr. Anthony brought your ol' man's company down—I'd worry about you hearing the full picture from his side soon enough.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: And wouldn't I look like a cheat and a scoundrel then? You'd want nothing to do with me.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: So I may as well tell you everything you oughta know. Let you choose for yourself.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Go and put all those past disputes to one side. Just think about this one, simple question—
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: You gonna choose to help him out of sympathy with likely no returns, or are you gonna help me for all I've promised in your interest?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Miss Robin. Have you decided?
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: ...I'm in.
attributes.name: Robin
